sentences.chinese: 他们委托一位建筑师设计这座新图书馆。

sentences.english: The building was constructed from the design of that architect.
sentences.chinese: 这幢大楼是按那位建筑师的设计建造的。

detailed_translations.english: someone whose job is to design buildings

sentences.english: Judge Sanders: Get out of the chair!
sentences.chinese: 法官桑德斯：离开这把椅子！

sentences.english: "She taught me confidence, and with confidence I could do anything at all, " says Sanders.
sentences.chinese: 桑德斯说，“她教会了我自信，拥有自信我就敢于面对一切。

sentences.english: She said Sanders will be teaching a class for parents and caregivers of adolescents or children with brain disorders.
sentences.chinese: 桑德斯也说她将要一直为那些有智力障碍的儿童或青少年的父母或看护人上课。

sentences.english: Farmers have been slow to make adequate provision for their retirement.
sentences.chinese: 农民们迟迟没有为退休做好适当安排。

sentences.english: Some creams we tested failed to give adequate protection against UV light.
sentences.chinese: 我们检测的有些防晒霜不能提供足够的防紫外线保护。

sentences.english: The standard of his work is barely adequate .
sentences.chinese: 他的工作水准勉强合格。

sentences.english: The company has yet to provide an adequate explanation for its actions.
sentences.chinese: 该公司对其行动仍未作出充分解释。

detailed_translations.chinese: 足够的； 可以胜任的
detailed_translations.english: enough in quantity or of a good enough quality for a particular purpose

name: access
trans: 通路；进入；到达；面见〔的难易度〕；进入权

sentences.english: Access is by means of a small door on the right.
sentences.chinese: 入口是右边的一扇小门。

detailed_translations.chinese: 接近；通道，入口；接近的机会
detailed_translations.english: the way you use to enter a building or reach a place
to find information, especially on a computer

name: accessible
trans: 可接近的；可进入的；可使用的

sentences.english: The island is only accessible by boat.
sentences.chinese: 这个岛只有坐船才能到。

sentences.english: There is a church which is easily accessible from my home.
sentences.chinese: 有座教堂离我家很近。

detailed_translations.chinese: 易接近的；可进入的；可理解的
detailed_translations.english: a place, building, or object that is accessible is easy to reach or get into

sentences.english: Lynn has been confined to a wheelchair (= has had to use a wheelchair ) for the last year.
sentences.chinese: 过去一年中林恩都被困在轮椅上。

sentences.english: special parking for wheelchair users
sentences.chinese: 坐轮椅人士的专用停车位

detailed_translations.english: a chair with wheels, used by people who cannot walk

sentences.english: It’s quite a handy little tool.
sentences.chinese: 这件小工具非常有用。

sentences.english: It’s very handy having a light above your desk.
sentences.chinese: 书桌上方有盏灯很有用。

sentences.english: Take your swimming trunks with you – they might come in handy (= be useful ).
sentences.chinese: 带上你的游泳裤，可能会派上用场的。

detailed_translations.english: useful

sentences.english: The reason for this is that the useful earphone control button / mic requires special jack.
sentences.chinese: 这么设计的原因是耳机的控制按钮（同时也是麦克风）需要特殊插孔。

sentences.english: The language of kabuki is difficult to understand, but earphones are provided to explain the story, and there are also earphone services available in English.
sentences.chinese: 歌舞伎中使用的语言很难理解，但是剧场提供耳机，观众可以戴上耳机来了解故事的内容，还有英文解说。

sentences.english: By e-mail and earphone, he confers with Jack Parrish, chief meteorologist, and they order the NOAA technician to slip a dropsonde into the shoot.
sentences.chinese: 通过电子邮件和耳机，他与首席气象学家杰克·帕里什联络，指挥NOAA的技术人员发射下投式探空仪。

detailed_translations.english: a small piece of equipment connected by a wire to a radio, personal stereo etc, which you put in or over your ears so that only you can listen to it

sentences.english: The illness had impaired his ability to think and concentrate.
sentences.chinese: 这种疾病损害了他的思维能力和注意力。

detailed_translations.english: to damage something or make it not as good as it should be

sentences.english: a family row
sentences.chinese: 家庭争吵

sentences.english: He had just had a row with his wife.
sentences.chinese: 他刚刚和妻子吵了一架。

detailed_translations.english: a short angry argument, especially between people who know each other well

sentences.english: They bought an old schoolhouse to live in and built a workshop in the basement.
sentences.chinese: 他们买了座旧校舍居住，还在地下室建了个作坊。

detailed_translations.english: a room or area in a building that is under the level of the ground

sentences.english: The door opens outwards.
sentences.chinese: 这门是朝外开的。

detailed_translations.english: towards the outside or away from the centre of something

sentences.english: We made for the nearest exit.
sentences.chinese: 我们走向最近的出口。

sentences.english: an exit door
sentences.chinese: 出口门

sentences.english: Two men were blocking her exit.
sentences.chinese: 两个男人挡住了她出去的路。

detailed_translations.english: a door or space through which you can leave a public room, building etc
to leave a place

sentences.english: Representatives of EU countries will meet with senior American politicians to discuss the trade crisis.
sentences.chinese: 欧盟国家的代表们将会晤美国高级政要来讨论贸易危机。

sentences.english: The president has already given his approval to the plan.
sentences.chinese: 总统已经批准了这个计划。

sentences.english: It is just three months since we received official approval to go ahead with the project.
sentences.chinese: 三个月前我们刚刚得到正式批准进行这个项目。

sentences.english: A company cannot be sold without the approval of the shareholders.
sentences.chinese: 没有股东的同意不能出售公司。

sentences.english: The bill will be submitted for approval by Congress.
sentences.chinese: 这项法案将提交国会通过。

sentences.english: The President would appoint the Council of Ministers, subject to the approval of the National Assembly.
sentences.chinese: 总统将任命内阁成员，但需经国民议会批准。

sentences.english: The IMF has given its seal of approval to the government’s economic strategy.
sentences.chinese: 国际货币基金组织已经同意该政府的经济策略。

sentences.english: appointments requiring parliamentary approval
sentences.chinese: 需经议会批准的任命

sentences.english: She looked to Greg for approval.
sentences.chinese: 她指望格雷格同意。

detailed_translations.english: when a plan, decision, or person is officially accepted

sentences.english: We do this because we believe in the dignity and value of every person.
sentences.chinese: 我们这样做是因为我们相信每个人的尊严和价值。

sentences.english: They have to be treated well, with dignity.
sentences.chinese: 必须善待申请人，让人有尊严。

sentences.english: This award must be shared with everyone who strives for justice and dignity.
sentences.chinese: 我一定要与所有为正义和尊严奋斗的人分享此奖。

detailed_translations.english: the ability to behave in a calm controlled way even in a difficult situation

sentences.english: The shop’s daily profit is usually around $500.
sentences.chinese: 这家商店每天的利润一般在500美元左右。

sentences.english: She sold the business and bought a farm with the profits.
sentences.chinese: 她卖了公司，用所得利润买下了一座农场。

sentences.english: They sold their house at a healthy profit.
sentences.chinese: 他们卖掉房子，赚了一大笔钱。

sentences.english: There’s no profit in letting meetings drag on.
sentences.chinese: 会议拖拖拉拉没什么好处。

detailed_translations.english: money that you gain by selling things or doing business, after your costs have been paid
to get money from doing something

sentences.english: Not enough purple italics. . . .
sentences.chinese: 紫色斜体字不够......

sentences.english: Should bolding be applied first and then italics?
sentences.chinese: 是否应先应用粗体后应用斜体？

sentences.english: This doesn't mean, however, that whenever you want to have something in bold or italics you should shoehorn it into these two tags.
sentences.chinese: 但这并不意味着只要您想使某些内容变成粗体或斜体，就应该将它们硬塞进这两个标记中。

detailed_translations.english: a type of printed letters that lean to the right, often used to emphasize particular words

sentences.english: The new arts centre will serve the whole community.
sentences.chinese: 这座新的艺术中心将为整个社区服务。

sentences.english: the Polish community in London
sentences.chinese: 在伦敦的波兰侨民团体

detailed_translations.english: the people who live in the same area, town etc

sentences.english: household chores
sentences.chinese: 家务杂活

sentences.english: ...growing up in a male-only household.
sentences.chinese: …在全体成员均为男性的家庭里长大。

detailed_translations.chinese: 家庭的， 家喻户晓的
detailed_translations.english: relating to looking after a house and the people in it
A household is all the people in a family or group who live together in a house

name: fiction
trans: 小说；虚构或想象出来的事

sentences.english: romantic fiction
sentences.chinese: 爱情小说

sentences.english: historical fiction
sentences.chinese: 历史小说

sentences.english: For years he managed to keep up the fiction that he was not married.
sentences.chinese: 多年来他设法一直给人一种未婚的假象。

detailed_translations.english: books and stories about imaginary people and events

sentences.english: The hotel has everything you could possibly desire .
sentences.chinese: 这家酒店里你想要的东西应有尽有。

sentences.english: Add lemon juice if desired .
sentences.chinese: 需要的话加点柠檬汁。

detailed_translations.english: to want something very much
a strong hope or wish

sentences.english: As Isaac Asimov once commented, we scored a touchdown, then took our football and went home.
sentences.chinese: 正如艾萨克·阿西莫夫评论的那样，我们只赢得一次达阵，然后便收起球回家了。

sentences.english: One of the most celebrated science fiction authors, Isaac Asimov, outlined 'Three Laws of Robotics' in a novel featuring human-like robots. The rules were designed to protect people from harm.
sentences.chinese: 最著名的科幻小说作者之一，艾萨克·阿西莫夫，在一本以仿生机器人为特写的小说中，他概述了“机器人三定律”，旨在保护人类免受伤害。

sentences.english: Isaac Asimov is the only author to have a book in every Dewey-decimal category.
sentences.chinese: 艾萨克·阿西莫夫（Isaac Asimov）是美国唯一位在每一版杜威图书里都有出现他的书的作家。

sentences.english: She got great satisfaction from helping people to learn.
sentences.chinese: 她在帮助人们学习的过程中得到很大的满足。

detailed_translations.english: a feeling of happiness or pleasure because you have achieved something or got what you wanted

sentences.english: Larry Belmont worked for a company that made robots.
sentences.chinese: 拉里·贝尔蒙特的工作，这家公司制造的机器人。

sentences.english: Oh, yes, of course. Some old woman, Claire something I guess.
sentences.chinese: 啊，是的，当然，一个老太太，叫克莱尔还是什么。

sentences.english: I spent time with Claire [Danes], and her portrayal of me back then is very authentic. She was me.
sentences.chinese: 我和克莱尔相处了一段时间，她对于那时的我的演绎是很可信的，她就是曾经的我。

sentences.english: He knew they had wanted to have a baby, but Claire had suffered a miscarriage after becoming pregnant by another donor.
sentences.chinese: 当时他知道她们很想要有个小孩，而克莱儿却通过另外一个捐精者的精子怀孕后不幸流产。

sentences.english: Long-term savers qualify for a cash bonus.
sentences.chinese: 长期储户可获现金红利。

sentences.english: Further additions to your pay may take the form of bonus payments.
sentences.chinese: 工资以外的钱可能以奖金的形式发放。

sentences.english: a Christmas bonus
sentences.chinese: 圣诞节奖金

sentences.english: Each worker receives an annual bonus.
sentences.chinese: 每个员工都可获得一笔年度奖金。

sentences.english: a £20,000 bonus
sentences.chinese: 一笔2万英镑的奖金

detailed_translations.english: money added to someone’s wages, especially as a reward for good work

sentences.english: I forgot to set the burglar alarm.
sentences.chinese: 我忘记打开防盗警报器了。

sentences.english: Car alarms are always going off in the street.
sentences.chinese: 街上总有汽车警报器在响。

sentences.english: a sophisticated alarm system
sentences.chinese: 精密的警报系统

sentences.english: We could not see what had alarmed him.
sentences.chinese: 我们不明白是什么吓着他了。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of equipment that makes a loud noise to warn you of danger
If something alarms you, it makes you afraid or anxious that something unpleasant or dangerous might happen

sentences.english: Environmentalists are alarmed by the increase in pollution.
sentences.chinese: 不断加重的污染引起环保人士的担忧。

detailed_translations.english: worried or frightened

sentences.english: She wiped her eyes with her apron.
sentences.chinese: 她用她的围裙擦干了眼泪。

sentences.english: She had put her louis in the pocket of her new apron.
sentences.chinese: 她已把她的那枚路易放在她新围裙的口袋里了。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of clothing that covers the front part of your clothes and is tied around your waist, worn to keep your clothes clean, especially while cooking

sentences.english: Our sympathies are with the families of the victims.
sentences.chinese: 我们向受害者家庭表示慰问。

detailed_translations.english: the feeling of being sorry for someone who is in a bad situation

sentences.english: I wonder if this letter is overweight.
sentences.chinese: 我想知道这封信是否超重。

sentences.english: If your luggage is overweight, you'll have to pay extra.
sentences.chinese: 假如你的行李过重了， 你得付额外的运费。

sentences.english: Why are so many of us overweight?
sentences.chinese: 为什么我们中的许多人会超重？

sentences.english: a tall, elegant young woman
sentences.chinese: 身材高挑、举止优雅的年轻女子

sentences.english: You can dine in elegant surroundings.
sentences.chinese: 你可以在雅致的环境中进餐。

detailed_translations.english: beautiful, attractive, or graceful

sentences.english: As she turned around, there stood Gladys Claffern.
sentences.chinese: 她刚一转身，就看到格拉蒂斯·克拉芬站在那里。

sentences.english: As she turned around , there stood Gladys Claffern.
sentences.chinese: 当她转过身去时，格拉雷斯·克拉芬站在那里。

sentences.english: Could you do me a favour and tell Kelly I can’t make it?
sentences.chinese: 你帮个忙告诉凯莉说我来不了好吗？

sentences.english: He hired John as a favour to his father.
sentences.chinese: 他雇约翰是给他父亲一个面子。

sentences.english: Paul, can I ask you a favor ?
sentences.chinese: 保罗，能帮我一下吗？

sentences.english: I owed him a favour so I couldn’t say no.
sentences.chinese: 我欠他一个人情，所以无法拒绝。

sentences.english: She helps me out when I have too much to do, and I return the favour when I can.
sentences.chinese: 我忙的时候她来帮忙，我能帮她的时候就还她人情。

sentences.english: Do yourself a favour and make sure you get some time to yourself.
sentences.chinese: 对自己好些，一定要留点时间给自己。

detailed_translations.english: something that you do for someone in order to help them or be kind to them

detailed_translations.chinese: 赞同； 喜爱， 偏爱； 有利于
detailed_translations.english: to provide suitable conditions for something to happen

sentences.english: He balanced the plate on the top of a pile of books.
sentences.chinese: 他把盘子在一摞书上放稳。

sentences.english: Ma stacked the cups and piled the plates.
sentences.chinese: 妈妈把杯盘堆叠起来。

detailed_translations.english: a group of several things of the same type that are put on top of each other
to arrange things in a pile

name: scan
trans: 细看；仔细检查；粗略地看；浏览；扫描

sentences.english: He scanned the horizon, but there was no sign of the ship.
sentences.chinese: 他朝地平线处仔细眺望，但是找不到那艘船的踪影。

sentences.english: She scanned his face, looking for signs of what he was thinking.
sentences.chinese: 她端详着他的脸，想知道他在想些什么。

sentences.english: Video cameras scanned the car park.
sentences.chinese: 摄像机监视着停车场。

sentences.english: She scanned through the paper.
sentences.chinese: 她浏览了一下报纸。

sentences.english: 英文例句:You scan the text into the computer, then edit it.
sentences.chinese: 把文本扫描进电脑，然后进行编辑。

detailed_translations.english: to examine an area carefully but quickly, often because you are looking for a particular person or thing

sentences.english: It takes about 150 days to grow out a full length fingernail.
sentences.chinese: 大约150天的时间就可以长一个完整的指甲出来。

sentences.english: As I turned on my side I noticed pieces of fingernail, bits of skin and hair on the lift carpet.
sentences.chinese: 当我转身侧卧时，注意到电梯的地毯上有零星的指甲、皮肤碎屑和头发。

sentences.english: The top of the box was sealed with wide brown parcel tape, Jacob managed to get his fingernail under the end and peeled off the tape in one go.
sentences.chinese: 箱子的顶端是用褐色的包裹胶带封起来的，雅各布用指甲把胶带的一头抠起来，一下子把胶带整个扯开。

detailed_translations.english: the hard flat part that covers the top end of your finger

sentences.english: It seems an absurd idea.
sentences.chinese: 这似乎是个荒唐的想法。

detailed_translations.english: completely stupid or unreasonable

sentences.english: Do you like my new haircut?
sentences.chinese: 你喜欢我的新发型吗？

detailed_translations.english: when you have a haircut, someone cuts your hair for you

sentences.english: Normally she wore little makeup, but this evening was clearly an exception.
sentences.chinese: 通常她很少化妆，可今晚显然是个例外。

sentences.english: There was some fatal flaw in his makeup, and as time went on he lapsed into long silences or became off-hand.
sentences.chinese: 他性格中有某种致命的缺陷，随着时间的推移，他要么陷入长时间沉默要么行为随便。

sentences.english: The ideological makeup of the unions is now radically different from what it had been.
sentences.chinese: 这些协会的意识形态构成如今与过去大相径庭。

detailed_translations.english: Makeup consists of things such as lipstick, eye shadow, and powder which some women put on their faces to make themselves look more attractive or which actors use to change or improve their appearance

sentences.english: Children under 14 must be accompanied by an adult.
sentences.chinese: 14岁以下儿童必须有成人陪同。

sentences.english: Wherever her husband went, she would accompany him.
sentences.chinese: 不论丈夫去哪里，她都陪伴左右。

detailed_translations.chinese: 陪同， 伴随； 为…伴奏
detailed_translations.english: to go somewhere with someone

sentences.english: a velvet cushion
sentences.chinese: 天鹅绒垫子

sentences.english: a cushion cover
sentences.chinese: 垫子套

detailed_translations.chinese: 垫子；起缓解作用之物；（猪等的）臀肉；银行储蓄
detailed_translations.english: a cloth bag filled with soft material that you put on a chair or the floor to make it more comfortable

detailed_translations.chinese: 给…安上垫子；把…安置在垫子上；缓和…的冲击
detailed_translations.english: to make the effect of a fall or hit less painful, for example by having something soft in the way

detailed_translations.chinese: 寝具；（建筑）[建] 基床；（家畜）草垫
detailed_translations.english: sheets, covers etc that you put on a bed

sentences.english: She was wearing a coral necklace.
sentences.chinese: 她戴着一串珊瑚项链。

detailed_translations.english: a string of jewels, beads etc or a thin gold or silver chain to wear around the neck

name: clerk
trans: 售货员；职员；旅馆接待员

sentences.english: a clerk in a commercial firm
sentences.chinese: 一家商行的文员

detailed_translations.chinese: 职员，办事员；店员；书记；记账员；<古>牧师，教士
detailed_translations.english: someone who keeps records or accounts in an office

detailed_translations.chinese: 当销售员，当店员；当职员
detailed_translations.english: to work as a clerk

sentences.english: He wondered if the girl behind the counter recognised him.
sentences.chinese: 他在想柜台后面的那个女孩是否认出了他。

sentences.english: Set the video counter to zero before you press play.
sentences.chinese: 在按播放键之前，把录像机上的计数器调到零。

detailed_translations.english: the place where you pay or are served in a shop, bank, restaurant etc

sentences.english: I want to ring up my professor.
sentences.chinese: 我想打电话给我的教授。

sentences.english: Did a girl called Gao Hong ring up for me this morning?
sentences.chinese: 今早有个叫高红的女孩给我打电话了吗?

detailed_translations.english: to telephone someone

sentences.english: Bud turned the truck around, and started back for Dalton Pond.
sentences.chinese: 巴德把卡车调了个头，开始返回道尔顿池塘。

sentences.english: He had reached over to turn around a bottle of champagne so that the label didn't show.
sentences.chinese: 他伸过手把一瓶香槟酒转过去，使它的标签显露不出来。

detailed_translations.english: If you turn something around, or if it turns around, it is moved so that it faces the opposite direction

name: awful
trans: 极坏的；极讨厌的；可怕的；（口语）糟透的

sentences.english: The weather was awful.
sentences.chinese: 天气很糟糕。

detailed_translations.english: very bad or unpleasant

sentences.english: Are you interested in world affairs?
sentences.chinese: 你对世界大事感兴趣吗？

sentences.english: the Ministry of Foreign Affairs

sentences.chinese: 治疗方案是针对各个病人的需要而制订的。

to make something so that it is exactly right for someone’s particular needs or for a particular purpose

sentences.english: We have a good example in Tanzania.
sentences.chinese: 我们在坦桑尼亚有一个很好的例子。

sentences.english: After his visit to South Africa, he will also continue to visit Tanzania and Uganda.
sentences.chinese: 在结束对南非的访问后，他还将继续访问坦桑尼亚和乌干达。

sentences.english: Some countries, ranging from Rwanda and Tanzania in East Africa, to Egypt and Morocco in the North and South Africa in the South, have steadily increased their science spending.
sentences.chinese: 从东非的卢旺达和坦桑尼亚，到北非的埃及和摩洛哥，再到非洲南部的南非，一些国家已经稳步增加了它们的科学开支。

sentences.english: Economic growth is slow.
sentences.chinese: 经济增长缓慢。

sentences.english: the government’s economic policy
sentences.chinese: 政府的经济政策

sentences.english: Economic reform is needed.
sentences.chinese: 经济改革势在必行。

sentences.english: In the current economic climate (= conditions ), we must keep costs down.
sentences.chinese: 在当前的经济形势下，我们一定要控制好成本。

detailed_translations.english: relating to trade, in-dustry, and the management of money

sentences.english: a monarch without political power
sentences.chinese: 没有政治权力的君主

sentences.english: He was a political prisoner (= one who was put in prison because he was thought to be harmful to the state) .
sentences.chinese: 他曾是个政治犯。

detailed_translations.english: connected with the state, government or public affairs

sentences.english: This is Nepal.
sentences.chinese: 这是尼泊尔。

sentences.english: “We have plans to distribute the filter in India and Nepal,” Hussam said.
sentences.chinese: 胡珊说，"我们还计划在印度和尼泊尔分发这种过滤器。"

sentences.english: You can spend one hour tracking here, whereas in Uganda it can take all day.
sentences.chinese: 这里你只要花一小时既可以找到他们，但是在乌干达需要一整天。

sentences.english: After his visit to South Africa, he will also continue to visit Tanzania and Uganda.
sentences.chinese: 在结束对南非的访问后，他还将继续访问坦桑尼亚和乌干达。

sentences.english: Many others, he says, have moved in with relatives in Gisenyi or crossed the border to Uganda.
sentences.chinese: 他说，另外许多人搬到吉塞尼的亲戚家里，或者越过边境进入乌干达。

sentences.english: a man distributing leaflets to passers-by
sentences.chinese: 一个向路人派发传单的男子

sentences.english: Make sure that your weight is evenly distributed.
sentences.chinese: 注意让你的重量分布均匀。

detailed_translations.english: to share things among a group of people, especially in a planned way

sentences.english: a distribution centre
sentences.chinese: 经销中心

detailed_translations.english: the act of sharing things among a large group of people in a planned way

sentences.english: financial transactions
sentences.chinese: 财务往来

sentences.english: financial assistance
sentences.chinese: 财务援助

sentences.english: a financial advisor
sentences.chinese: 财务顾问

sentences.english: Organic farmers should be encouraged with financial incentives.
sentences.chinese: 应对实行有机栽培的农民给予经济上的鼓励。

sentences.english: It was a wonderful film, but not exactly a financial success (= something that makes a profit ) .
sentences.chinese: 这是一部出色的影片，但在票房上不是很成功。

detailed_translations.english: relating to money or the management of money

sentences.english: The trial was held under tight security .
sentences.chinese: 这场审讯是在戒备森严的情况下进行的。

sentences.english: lax security at airline check-in desks
sentences.chinese: 登机手续柜台松懈的安全措施

sentences.english: terrorist activity that is a threat to national security
sentences.chinese: 威胁国家安全的恐怖活动

sentences.english: The prison was ordered to tighten security after a prisoner escaped yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 昨天一名囚犯越狱后，该监狱被勒令加强安全措施。

sentences.english: The Security Commission investigates breaches of security .
sentences.chinese: 安全委员会对违反安全规定的事项进行调查。

sentences.english: We have been asked not to say anything for security reasons .
sentences.chinese: 出于安全考虑，我们被要求守口如瓶。

sentences.english: The security forces opened fire, killing two people.
sentences.chinese: 保安部队开枪打死了两个人。

sentences.english: The thief was caught on a security camera .
sentences.chinese: 小偷被保安摄像机当场拍了下来。

sentences.english: There are strict security checks on everyone entering the Opera House.
sentences.chinese: 每个人进入歌剧院都要接受严格的安全检查。

sentences.english: A large number of homes lack adequate security measures .
sentences.chinese: 许多住宅都未采取足够的安全措施。

detailed_translations.english: things that are done to keep a person, building, or country safe from danger or crime

sentences.english: The whole tax system is now operating more efficiently.
sentences.chinese: 现在整个税收制度运作效率更高了。

sentences.english: The new law doesn’t operate in our favour.
sentences.chinese: 这项新法规对我们不利。

sentences.english: The car parks operate a pay-as-you-leave system.
sentences.chinese: 这些停车场按“离开时付费”的模式运作。

sentences.english: The bus company operates a Monday to Saturday service.
sentences.chinese: 这家公共汽车公司周一至周六运营。

detailed_translations.english: if a system, process, or service operates, or if you operate it, it works
to use and control a machine or equipment

sentences.english: An option could be to redeploy to the border troops based in other areas of south Sudan.
sentences.chinese: 他通过翻译说：“一种选择可能是重新部署南部苏丹其它地区的边境部队。

sentences.english: an appointment at an outpatient clinic
sentences.chinese: 门诊预约

detailed_translations.english: a place, often in a hospital, where medical treatment is given to people who do not need to stay in the hospital

sentences.english: Adopting jatropha, he thinks, will be a first step out of poverty for Malawi's farmers, and they seem willing to try.
sentences.chinese: 他认为，种植麻疯树将是马拉维农民摆脱贫困的第一步，而这些农民似乎也愿意尝试一下。

sentences.english: "Anyone could come to Malawi and quickly arrange for an adoption that might have grave consequences on the very children that the law seeks to protect," she said.
sentences.chinese: 她说：“任何人都可以到马拉维很快办理收养事宜，这可能会对那些法律寻求保护的孩子产生严重后果。”

sentences.english: The main section of the valley in Africa continues from the Red Sea across Ethiopia and across Kenya, Tanzania, and Malawi to the lower Zambezi River valley in Mozambique.
sentences.chinese: 大峡谷的主体部分来自非洲，延伸自红海穿过埃塞俄比亚，横跨两岸的肯尼亚、坦桑尼亚、马拉维到莫桑比克的赞比西河流域下游.

sentences.english: Eventually it all balances out and most people adjust to how their "new" body moves and works.
sentences.chinese: 不过最终，这一切都会达到平衡，多数人都适应‘新’身体的行动和运转方式。

sentences.english: What we’re seeing, they insist, is the dawning of a new life stage — a stage that all of us need to adjust to.
sentences.chinese: 他们坚持认为我们所见的是一个新生命阶段的开始——我们所有人都需要调整以适应这个阶段。

name: keep it up
trans: 保持优秀成绩；继续干下去

sentences.english: There are fears that he will not be able to keep it up when he gets to the particularly demanding third year.
sentences.chinese: 有人担心到了极其艰难的第3年他会坚持不下去的。

detailed_translations.chinese: 保持优秀成绩；继续干下去

sentences.english: She was great with the children and fit in beautifully.
sentences.chinese: 她对孩子们很有一手，相处得非常融洽。

detailed_translations.english: If you fit in as part of a group, you seem to belong there because you are similar to the other people in it

sentences.english: They are willing to die for the motherland.
sentences.chinese: 他们愿为祖国牺牲生命。

detailed_translations.english: someone’s motherland is the country where they were born and to which they feel a strong emotional connection

sentences.english: I was still in New York, trying to get a visa to visit Russia.
sentences.chinese: 我仍在纽约，正在办理去俄罗斯的签证。

detailed_translations.english: an official mark put on your passport that gives you permission to temporarily enter or leave a foreign country

sentences.english: You’ll have to join the queue.
sentences.chinese: 你得排队。

sentences.english: Some of the people queuing for tickets had been there since dawn.
sentences.chinese: 购票队伍中有些人天刚亮就来了。

detailed_translations.english: a line of people waiting to enter a building, buy something etc, or a line of vehicles waiting to move
to form or join a line of people or vehicles waiting to do something or go somewhere

sentences.english: the school cafeteria
sentences.chinese: 学校餐厅

detailed_translations.english: a restaurant, often in a factory, college etc, where you choose from foods that have already been cooked and carry your own food to a table

sentences.english: He regularly gives lectures on modern French literature.
sentences.chinese: 他经常讲授法国现代文学课程。

sentences.english: He lectures on European art at Manchester University.
sentences.chinese: 他在曼彻斯特大学讲授欧洲艺术。

detailed_translations.english: a long talk on a particular subject that someone gives to a group of people, especially to students in a university
to talk to a group of people on a particular subject, especially to students in a university

sentences.english: He left school without any qualifications.
sentences.chinese: 他离校时没有拿到任何文凭。

detailed_translations.english: if you have a qualification, you have passed an examination or course to show you have a particular level of skill or knowledge in a subject

sentences.english: This dish is good for dinner parties because much of the preparation can be done ahead of time.
sentences.chinese: 这道菜适合宴会，因为很多准备工作可以事先做好。

sentences.english: Plans for the new school are now in preparation .
sentences.chinese: 新学校的设计图正在绘制中。

sentences.english: a course in food service and food preparation
sentences.chinese: 餐饮服务和备菜课程

detailed_translations.english: the process of preparing something or preparing for something

sentences.english: I recommend the butter chicken - it’s delicious.
sentences.chinese: 我推荐黄油焗鸡，非常好吃。

sentences.english: Can you recommend a good lawyer?
sentences.chinese: 你能介绍一位好律师吗？

detailed_translations.english: to say that something or someone is good, or suggest them for a particular purpose or job

sentences.chinese: 这姑娘替那店主只干了三天， 就辞职不干了。

sentences.chinese: 在伦敦的杰明街，一个店主焦急地问道，谁将是（美国）下一任总统。

sentences.chinese: 我是一个没人知道的异乡人，本可以大胆地轻易逃避付款，但是从来没有一个伦敦的店主不信任我。

sentences.chinese: …如“翻开新的一页”这样熟悉的习语和比喻。

detailed_translations.english: a group of words that has a special meaning that is different from the ordinary meaning of each separate word. For example, ‘under the weather’ is an idiom meaning ‘ill’.

sentences.english: I dress for comfort, not fashion.
sentences.chinese: 我穿衣服只讲舒服，不追求时髦。

sentences.english: Alan was very reluctant to leave the warmth and comfort of the fire.
sentences.chinese: 艾伦很不情愿离开暖和舒适的火堆。

sentences.english: Now you can watch your favorite movies in the comfort of your own home.
sentences.chinese: 现在你可以舒舒服服地在自己家里看你最喜欢的电影了。

sentences.english: Whenever he was upset, he would turn to her for comfort and advice.
sentences.chinese: 他每当心烦意乱时，就会去向她寻求安慰和建议。

sentences.english: He longed to take her in his arms and comfort her.
sentences.chinese: 他很想把她搂在怀里安慰她。

detailed_translations.english: a feeling of being physically relaxed and satisfied, so that nothing is hurting you, making you feel too hot or cold etc
to make someone feel less worried, unhappy, or upset, for example by saying kind things to them or touching them

sentences.english: Germany brought on a substitute at half time.
sentences.chinese: 德国队在比赛半场时换上一名替补队员。

sentences.english: substitute goalkeeper
sentences.chinese: 替补守门员

detailed_translations.english: someone who does someone else’s job for a limited period of time, especially in a sports team or school
to use something new or diffe-rent instead of something else

sentences.english: He possessed no academic qualifications.
sentences.chinese: 他没有学历。

sentences.english: a program to raise academic standards
sentences.chinese: 旨在提高学术水平的计划

detailed_translations.english: relating to education, especially at college or university level

sentences.english: The refugees’ main requirements are food and shelter.
sentences.chinese: 难民的主要需求是食物和住所。

sentences.english: to meet/fulfil/satisfy the requirements
sentences.chinese: 符合 / 满足必备的条件

detailed_translations.english: something that someone needs or asks for

sentences.english: an essay on Bernard Shaw
sentences.chinese: 关于萧伯纳的文章

sentences.english: We asked Jason to write an essay about his hometown.
sentences.chinese: 我们让杰森写一篇关于他家乡的短文。

detailed_translations.english: a short piece of writing about a particular subject by a student as part of a course of study

sentences.chinese: 他是由家庭教师教的。

detailed_translations.english: someone who gives private lessons to one student or a small group, and is paid directly by them

sentences.chinese: 由于地方上的反对，学院已经修改了计划。

sentences.english: We have revised our estimates of population growth.
sentences.chinese: 我们已修正了对人口增长的估计。

detailed_translations.english: to change something because of new information or ideas

sentences.english: I know I haven’t done enough revision for tomorrow’s exam.
sentences.chinese: 我知道我对明天的考试准备不足。

detailed_translations.english: the process of changing something in order to improve it by correcting it or including new information or ideas

sentences.english: the rough draft of his new novel
sentences.chinese: 他的新小说的草稿

sentences.english: I read the first draft and thought it was very good.
sentences.chinese: 我读了第一稿，觉得非常好。

sentences.english: All parties eventually approved the final draft (= finished form ) of the peace treaty.
sentences.chinese: 各方最后都同意了和平条约的终稿。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of writing or a plan that is not yet in its finished form
to write a plan, letter, report etc that will need to be changed before it is in its finished form

sentences.english: The cold had numbed her fingers.
sentences.chinese: 她的手指冻僵了。

sentences.english: the numbing effect of the drug
sentences.chinese: 那种药物的麻醉效果

detailed_translations.chinese: 使麻木；使发愣；使失去感觉
detailed_translations.english: to make someone unable to feel pain or feel things they are touching
a part of your body that is numb is unable to feel anything, for example because you are very cold

sentences.english: The family acknowledge the need for change.
sentences.chinese: 全家人都承认需要改变一下。

sentences.english: I would be grateful if you would acknowledge receipt of this letter.
sentences.chinese: 收到此信后请告知，不胜感谢。

detailed_translations.english: to admit or accept that something is true or that a situation exists

name: as far as one is concerned

sentences.english: Deborah opened her mouth to contradict, but closed it again.
sentences.chinese: 黛博拉张口想要反驳，但又把嘴闭上了。

sentences.english: Dad just can’t bear to be contradicted.
sentences.chinese: 爸爸就是受不了有人反驳他。

sentences.english: The article flatly contradicts their claims.
sentences.chinese: 这篇文章断然驳斥他们的说法。

detailed_translations.english: to disagree with something, especially by saying that the opposite is true

sentences.english: They proudly declared themselves part of a new autonomous province.
sentences.chinese: 他们自豪地宣布自己是新自治省的一部分。

detailed_translations.english: an autonomous place or organization is free to govern or control itself

sentences.english: Football occupies most of my leisure time.
sentences.chinese: 足球占去了我大部分的闲暇时间。

detailed_translations.english: if something occupies you or your time, you are busy doing it

sentences.english: She’s fully occupied with work.
sentences.chinese: 工作使她忙得不可开交。

sentences.english: state/public enterprise (=one owned by the government)
sentences.chinese: 国有企业/公共事业单位

sentences.english: We’re looking for young people with enterprise and creativity.
sentences.chinese: 我们在寻找有事业心和创造力的年轻人。

detailed_translations.chinese: 事业,企(事)业单位；事业心,进取心
detailed_translations.english: a company, organization, or business

sentences.english: Edward can’t be here today, but he sends his apologies .
sentences.chinese: 爱德华今天来不了，他向大家表示歉意。

detailed_translations.chinese: 道歉；谢罪；辩护；勉强的替代物
detailed_translations.english: something that you say or write to show that you are sorry for doing something wrong

sentences.english: a Shakespeare seminar
sentences.chinese: 莎士比亚研讨班

detailed_translations.english: a class at a university or college for a small group of students and a teacher to study or discuss a particular subject

sentences.english: In the future, shopping can be done by videophone.
sentences.chinese: 在将来，购买东西能在可视电话中进行。

sentences.english: The word "ready" appears on the screen of the videophone.
sentences.chinese: 可视电话机的荧屏上出现了“请通话”这个词。

sentences.english: Things like videophone and videoconferencing are usually called video services. This type is also regarded as multimedia services.
sentences.chinese: 比如可视电话、会议电视等，这些被称作视像业务，也叫多媒体业务。

detailed_translations.english: a type of telephone that allows you to see the person you are talking to on a screen

detailed_translations.chinese: 英式橄榄球；拉格比（英格兰中部的城市）
detailed_translations.english: Rugby or rugby football is a game played by two teams using an oval ball. Players try to score points by carrying the ball to their opponents' end of the field, or by kicking it over a bar fixed between two posts.

name: bachelor
trans: 未婚男子；获学士学位的人

sentences.english: Gerald was 38, and a confirmed bachelor (=  a man who has decided that he will never marry  ) .
sentences.chinese: 杰拉德38岁，抱定主意独身。

sentences.english: a Bachelor of Arts/Engineering/Science
sentences.chinese: 文学士；工程学士；理学士

detailed_translations.english: a man who has never been married

sentences.english: John’s departure had upset their daily routine .
sentences.chinese: 约翰的离去打乱了他们的日常生活。

sentences.english: Try to get into a routine (= develop a fixed order of doing things ) .
sentences.chinese: 尽量养成一套习惯。

sentences.english: my daily exercise routine
sentences.chinese: 我每天的锻炼习惯

sentences.english: Dressing is a task which we do every day as a matter of routine (= done regularly and not unusual ) .
sentences.chinese: 穿衣打扮是我们每天必做的事情。

sentences.english: You mustn’t worry. These are just routine enquiries.
sentences.chinese: 你不必担心，这只是例行的询问。

detailed_translations.english: the usual order in which you do things, or the things you regularly do
happening as a normal part of a job or process

sentences.english: He was then taken by minibus to the military base.
sentences.chinese: 接着他被小型公共汽车带到了军事基地。

detailed_translations.chinese: 面包车（等于microbus）；小型公共汽车；中客车
detailed_translations.english: a small bus with seats for six to twelve people

sentences.english: three optional courses
sentences.chinese: 三门选修课

sentences.english: The other excursions are optional.
sentences.chinese: 其他的短途旅行是自选项目。

detailed_translations.english: if something is optional, you do not have to do it or use it, but you can choose to if you want to

sentences.english: I hate to see birds in cages.
sentences.chinese: 我不喜欢看到鸟在笼子里。

detailed_translations.english: a structure made of wires or bars in which birds or animals can be kept

detailed_translations.chinese: 把…关进笼子；把…囚禁起来
detailed_translations.english: to put or keep an animal or bird in a cage

sentences.english: In Finland purists insist that only birch bark should be added.
sentences.chinese: 在芬兰，纯化论者坚持说只能加白桦树皮。

sentences.english: Cork bark is closely intertwined with the lives of the people in these regions.
sentences.chinese: 软木橡树的树皮与这些地方的百姓生活密切地交织在一起。

sentences.english: In his workshop, a Kakunodate craftsman prepares the cherry bark before applying this as a veneer to a range of objects.
sentences.chinese: 在将这种工艺作为一系列物体的单板运用之前，角馆的工匠在自己的作坊准备樱花树皮。

detailed_translations.english: the outer covering of a tree

sentences.english: You have to take the top off to change the batteries .
sentences.chinese: 你得把顶盖拿掉才能更换电池。

sentences.english: When the red light comes on, you should recharge the battery .
sentences.chinese: 红灯亮起的时候你就应该给电池充电了。

sentences.english: The car’s got a flat battery .
sentences.chinese: 汽车的蓄电池没电了。

sentences.english: a battery-operated hairdryer
sentences.chinese: 使用电池的吹风机

detailed_translations.english: an object that provides a supply of electricity for something such as a radio, car, or toy

sentences.english: an archaeological site
sentences.chinese: 考古现场

detailed_translations.english: a place where something important or interesting happened
to place or build something in a particular place

sentences.english: Julie, do you know why we celebrate Easter?
sentences.chinese: 朱莉，你知道我们为什么庆祝复活节吗？

sentences.english: Julie: And then what do you do with that log?
sentences.chinese: 朱莉：然后你要拿那些记录做什么呢？

sentences.english: The St. Lawrence River held a particular poetry and beauty to me and (I) decided to live there with our daughter, Julie.
sentences.chinese: 圣劳伦斯河对我来说有着特殊的诗意和美感，(我) 决定和我的女儿朱莉一起生活在那里。

sentences.english: Like other women of the time, Abigail lacked formal education; but her curiosity spurred her keen intelligence, and she read avidly the books at hand.
sentences.chinese: 与同时代其他的妇女一样，阿比盖尔缺乏正式的教育。 但是她的好奇心使她生性聪敏。

sentences.english: He complained to his wife Abigail, "My country has in its wisdom contrived for me the most insignificant office that ever the invention of man contrived or his imagination conceived.
sentences.chinese: 他曾对他的妻子阿比盖尔抱怨，“我们的国家自做聪明，拿那个最不起眼的职位给我，可能就是某个人即兴杰作或者是他的想象。”

sentences.english: As wife of the first Vice President, Abigail became a good friend to Mrs. Washington and a valued help in official entertaining, drawing on her experience of courts and society abroad.
sentences.chinese: 作为第一副总统夫人，阿比盖尔成为华盛顿夫人要好的朋友，依靠她在法院和国外的生活经验，对于官方娱乐活动提供了有益的帮助。

detailed_translations.english: the woman who brought provisions to David and his followers and subsequently became his wife (I Samuel 25:1–42)

sentences.english: an electric drill
sentences.chinese: 电钻

sentences.english: rifle drill
sentences.chinese: 步枪操练

sentences.english: Drill a hole in each corner.
sentences.chinese: 在每个角上钻一个孔。

detailed_translations.english: a tool or machine used for making holes in something
to make a hole in something using a drill

sentences.english: Systems engineering has been widely applied in the oilfield exploitation and construction.
sentences.chinese: 近年来，系统工程学在油田开发建设中应用广泛。

sentences.english: One partial solution to our energy problems lies not in the oilfield but in the cornfield, as nations increasingly replace some petroleum needs with bioenergy — fuel made from plants.
sentences.chinese: 解决能源危机的新出路不在油田，而可能在农田；世界各国正在用生物能源——从植物中提取的燃料——取代对部分石油制品的需求。

detailed_translations.english: an area of land or sea under which there is oil

sentences.english: "Contractors are using fine print to deny women like Jamie Leigh Jones their day in court, " he said in a Senate debate.
sentences.chinese: “承包商钻了法律的空子，拒绝类似杰米·雷·琼斯遭遇的妇女走向法庭。” 他在参议院辩论上说。

sentences.english: Some reports in the past week had even said she planned to name the child Jamilyn, after her younger sister Jamie and her mother Lynne.
sentences.chinese: 在过去的一周内，有报道称她 计划给孩子起名叫杰米琳，名字取自于她妹妹的名字杰米和母亲的名字琳。

sentences.english: Previous winners include Bono and Jamie Oliver, and the money is given to the winner's chosen charity.
sentences.chinese: 以前的获奖者有波诺和杰米·奥利弗，奖金将赠予获奖者选择的慈善机构。

sentences.english: Sam and John are pulling the rope.
sentences.chinese: 山姆和约翰在拔河。

sentences.english: Sam and I have been together for over a year.
sentences.chinese: 山姆和我在一起已经有一年多了。

sentences.english: Over several hours, Sam explained my assignment, should I choose to accept it.
sentences.chinese: 过了几个小时，我的任务山姆解释说，我应该选择接受它。

sentences.english: In places like Sao Paolo, Mexico City and Lima, the best restaurants are as good as anywhere in the world.
sentences.chinese: 在圣保罗、墨西哥城和利马，那里最好的餐厅拿到世界上任何地方都是最好的。

sentences.english: Some plant species, such as the Lima bean, secrete a nectar that ants find delicious.
sentences.chinese: 一些植物种类，如利马豆，分泌一种蚂蚁感到美味的花蜜。

sentences.english: Colombia’s mass transit system has been recognized as an international best practice and replicated in cities across the region, from Mexico City to Santiago and Lima.
sentences.chinese: 哥伦比亚的公共交通系统被视为国际最佳实践，在该地区从墨西哥城到圣地亚哥到利马的许多城市被复制。

sentences.english: In total, slides have killed five people in the Cuzco region.
sentences.chinese: 在库斯科地区泥石流总共已使5人丧生。

sentences.english: Cuzco the capital city, was said by the Spanish to be "as fine as any city in Spain".
sentences.chinese: 库斯科首都被西班牙人认为“其精致可以媲美西班牙的任何城市”。

sentences.english: Andean dancers wearingfeathered hats walk during celebrations in honor of the Lord of "QoyllurRit'i" near the town of Tayankani in Cuzco, on June 22, 2011.
sentences.chinese: 2011年6月22日，库斯科的塔亚卡尼镇附近举办的节庆活动中，安第斯山脉的舞者身着羽毛做成的帽子行走在山间。

sentences.english: Meanwhile, in Bolivia, halfway around the world and smack in the middle of the Andes, the controversy is causing chuckles.
sentences.chinese: 与此同时，在玻利维亚，在半个世界以及中东的安第斯山脉，这个争议引发了轻笑。

sentences.english: Even before it blooms, though, the Queen of the Andes has a regal presence, towering up to 40 feet (12 meters) in its mountain habitats of Peru and Bolivia.
sentences.chinese: 在开花前，“安弟斯女王”就非常引人注目了，它形状如塔，能长高到40英尺（12米），只在秘鲁与玻利维亚的山地中生长。

sentences.english: It sounds as though you enjoyed Peru.
sentences.chinese: 这听起来好像你喜欢秘鲁。

sentences.english: Well, in Peru you had to negotiate like that to get the freshest fish at the market.
sentences.chinese: 在秘鲁你必须这样还价你才能在市场上拿到最新鲜的鱼。

sentences.english: Our agent in Rio deals with all our Brazilian business.
sentences.chinese: 我们在里约热内卢的业务代表处理我们在巴西的全部业务。

detailed_translations.english: a person or company that represents another person or company, especially in business

name: travel agent
trans: 旅行代办人；旅行代理人

sentences.english: Next, I called a travel agent whose telephone number I found in a newspaper.
sentences.chinese: 接下来，我在报纸上查到一家旅行社代理人的电话号码，给他打了电话。

sentences.english: In Mianyang, a city close to the hardest-hit areas, travel agent Zhang Guangqing ignores the temporary travel ban.
sentences.chinese: 但在靠近重灾区的绵阳市，旅行社代理商张广清（音）根本无视这个临时旅游禁令。

detailed_translations.chinese: 旅行代办人；旅行代理人
detailed_translations.english: someone who owns or works in a travel agency

sentences.english: their geographical proximity to Japan (= nearness to Japan )
sentences.chinese: 它们和日本相邻的地理位置

detailed_translations.english: relating to the place in an area, country etc where something or someone is

sentences.english: Lines AB and CD are parallel. AB
sentences.chinese: 线与CD线平行。

sentences.english: two parallel roads
sentences.chinese: 两条平行的道路

sentences.english: Take the road running parallel to the main road just after the village.
sentences.chinese: 过那个村子后走与主干道平行的路。

detailed_translations.chinese: 并列的，平行的；类似的；对应的；并联的
detailed_translations.english: two lines, paths etc that are parallel to each other are the same distance apart along their whole length

detailed_translations.chinese: 可相比拟的事物，相似处；平行线，平行面；纬线
detailed_translations.english: a relationship or similarity between two things, especially things that exist or happen in different places or at different times

detailed_translations.chinese: 与…相似， 与… 相当， 比得上
detailed_translations.english: if one thing parallels another, they happen at the same time or are similar, and seem to be related

sentences.english: A girl runs on one ofthe Uros floating islands on Lake Titicaca in Puno, Peru, on May 29, 2011.
sentences.chinese: 2011年5月29日，秘鲁普诺市的的喀喀湖上的漂流岛，一个女孩正在奔跑。

sentences.english: Ubinas is one of many volcanoes that dot the high desert plateau east of Lake Titicaca in southern Peru.
sentences.chinese: 乌比纳斯火山是众多火山群中的一个，这些火山群位于秘鲁南部，的的喀喀湖以东的沙漠高原上。

sentences.english: Theprotesters oppose the Canadian Santa Ana silver mining project they say willpollute the Desaguadero River and Lake Titicaca.
sentences.chinese: 抗议者反对加拿大圣安娜银矿开采项目，声称该项目会污染德萨瓜德罗河和的的喀喀湖。

sentences.english: an abundant supply of fresh water
sentences.chinese: 充足的淡水供应

sentences.english: abundant opportunities for well qualified staff
sentences.chinese: 提供给高素质的员工的大量机会

detailed_translations.chinese: 丰富的， 富裕的； 大量的， 充足的
detailed_translations.english: something that is abundant exists or is available in large quantities so that there is more than enough

sentences.english: With this big stick, Inca kings began eyeing the lands and resources of others.
sentences.chinese: 有了这根军事大棒，印加帝王开始觊觎别人的土地和资源。

sentences.english: But within a hundred years after the Inca began building this impressive city, they started to abandon it.
sentences.chinese: 但在开始建设这个城市之后一百年，他们又放弃了这个令人印象深刻的印加城市。

sentences.english: He believed the Inca dynasty had far deeper roots, and Maukallacta seemed the logical place to look for them.
sentences.chinese: 他认为印加王朝有着更渊源的根，要找出来，毛卡拉塔似乎是个合理的地方。

detailed_translations.chinese: 印加人(古代秘鲁土著人)
detailed_translations.english: a member of a South American Indian people whose great empire centred on Peru lasted from about 1100 ad to the Spanish conquest in the early 1530s and is famed for its complex culture

sentences.english: the leaders who govern the country
sentences.chinese: 治理这个国家的领导人

sentences.english: The party had been governing for seven months.
sentences.chinese: 该党执政已经有七个月了。

sentences.english: The universe is governed by the laws of physics.
sentences.chinese: 宇宙受到物理法则的支配。

detailed_translations.english: to officially and legally control a country and make all the decisions about taxes, laws, public services etc

sentences.english: He walked onwards to the head of the lake.
sentences.chinese: 他一直向前，走到湖泊源头。

detailed_translations.english: forwards

sentences.english: Ellis Island has become one of America's most popular tourist destinations.
sentences.chinese: 埃利斯岛已经成为美国最受欢迎的游览地之一。

detailed_translations.english: the place that someone or something is going to

sentences.english: The next day the Espinar water strike spreads to communities near Machu Picchu.
sentences.chinese: 第二天，埃斯皮纳水罢工扩大到马丘比丘附近的社区。

sentences.english: Machu Picchu in Peru, which means ‘Old Peak, ” is one of the most enigmatic ancient sites in the world.
sentences.chinese: 马丘比丘在秘鲁是“古老的顶峰”的意思。 这是世界上最具神秘色彩的古老建筑。

sentences.english: As archaeologists learn more about what happened here, new questions continue to arise, guaranteeing that Machu Picchu will remain a place of mystery for years to come.
sentences.chinese: 作为考古学家了解这里发生的事情更多，新的问题继续出现，马丘比丘将在未来几年保持它神秘的面貌。

sentences.english: We’re staying at the Holiday Inn.
sentences.chinese: 我们住在假日酒店。

detailed_translations.english: a small hotel or pub, especially an old one in the countryside

name: out of the question
trans: 不可能的；不值得讨论的

sentences.english: He could draw men round him and keep them bound to him; while his powerful attraction was there, disruption was out of the question.
sentences.chinese: 他能够把人们吸引到他的周围而且保持他们的忠心；而他的强大吸引力所在之处，就不可能有分裂。

sentences.english: Shipping our television to the UK was out of the question—not only would it have been prohibitively expensive, it was unlikely to work here anyway.
sentences.chinese: 把我们的电视运到英国是绝对不可能的，不仅仅因为高昂的运输费用，还因为在这里它根本不能工作。

detailed_translations.chinese: 不可能的；不值得讨论的

sentences.english: He wants to hike round the world.
sentences.chinese: 他打算徒步旅行环游世界一周。

sentences.english: You can organize a picnic in the park, a group hike or bike ride, or meet up with friends for one of those free local events.
sentences.chinese: 你可以组织在公园野餐一群徒步旅行或者骑自行车或者和朋友会面为其中的一个免费本地事件。

detailed_translations.english: to take a long walk in the mountains or countryside
a long walk in the mountains or countryside
to increase a price, tax etc by a large amount

sentences.english: But he cleared from any liability his close friend, interior deputy minister Rico Puno, saying he did not violate any law or rule.
sentences.chinese: 但阿基诺三世免除了其密友、内政部副部长普诺(Rico Puno)的所有责任，称他没有违反任何法律法规。

sentences.english: Officials were still trying to determine the exact number of people intercepted by about 100 gunmen and taken to a remote mountainous area, said the interior secretary, Ronaldo Puno.
sentences.chinese: 内政部长罗纳尔多·普诺（Ronaldo Puno）说，官员们仍在试图确定约100名持枪歹徒劫持并带到偏远山区的人质的确切数字。

sentences.english: the family tomb
sentences.chinese: 家族坟墓

detailed_translations.english: a stone structure above or below the ground where a dead person is buried

name: settle in
trans: （迁入新居、更换工作后）安顿下来

sentences.english: I enjoyed school enormously once I'd settled in.
sentences.chinese: 一旦适应了，我就非常喜欢上学了。

detailed_translations.chinese: （迁入新居、更换工作后）安顿下来
detailed_translations.english: If you settle in, you become used to living in a new place, doing a new job, or going to a new school
